name: 25pcs Paint Brush Set, Fuumuui Acrylic Paint Brushes, Professional Artist Series with Wide Flat, Filbert, Fan, Dagger, Cat Tongue, Round, Angle, Rigger for Oil, Acrylic Canvas Paintings, Face Painting
short_description: High-Quality Synthetic Bristles: The soft synthetic bristles are great for load capacity and control of colors, consistent smooth flow of paint. while maintaining excellent elasticity and shape retention. Sturdy enough not easy to bend or split with pressure. They are easy to clean, rinse and look as good as new, making them suitable for long-term use.

No Loose Ferrules: Hand crafted and high quality double-crimped copper ferrules, the artificial installed bristles are compact and clean, strong adhesive at the connection between ferrule and shaft, so the ferrule is firmly pressed into the handle and will not loosen over time, no compromise to the performance or appearance after multiple painting and cleaning.

Variety of Shapes & Sizes: Paint brushes for acrylic painting set includes 24 brushes in 9 series (Large Wide Flat, Flat, Filbert, Fan, Dagger, Cat Tongue, Round, Angle, Rigger), 1pc palette knife, 1pc portable canvas roll. A selection of sizes allows you to bring your vision to life on a large scale, in tiny detail, or anything in between!

Ergonomic: The sturdy birch wooden handle is designed to conform to the curves of the hand. Well balanced light-weight handles feel good in your hand. Handles are the perfect length designed for comfort controlling. Making drawing less tiring even after long periods of time.

Portable Storage Canvas Roll: Start painting with ease by simply unrolling your brushes! Our portable, stylish, and lightweight roll fits comfortably in a carry bag or backpack. Importantly, it provides essential protection for your tools against damage. The high-density nylon canvas is comfortable and gentle in your hands, while also being waterproof and oil-proof for the brushes it holds.
